text:
wen the apache monitor is open aos we have a lot of open windows on taskar, if 
we whant to open a window via taskbar the click won't work we have double-click 
very times to activate the window. if we close apache monitor, everything works 
fine.

em portugues: quando o monitor está aberto e temos várias janelas abertas na 
taskbar, se pretender voltar ao browser para fazer refresh ou chamar outra 
janela já aberta, não dá, temos de fazer duplo-click muitas vezes para activar 
a janela, se fechar o monitor tudo funciona bem.
creator: jtoscano@mail.pt
listas@soledadpenades.com
text:
It also occurs on 2.0.48, I have experienced it several times. Solution is
closing the monitor and restarting again, but can be very amusing and tends to
make the system crash.

Please try a user support forum for more help if this is reproducible with a
recent release of httpd.

http://httpd.apache.org/lists.html#http-users
creator: jorton@redhat.com
